trans-unit.source: Using Application Proxy to publish applications for secure remote access
trans-unit.target: Using Application Proxy to publish applications for secure remote access

trans-unit.source: A topic that explains how to publish applications, such as SharePoint sites, Outlook Web Access and IIS-based apps, inside your private network and provides secure access to users outside your network.
trans-unit.target: A topic that explains how to publish applications, such as SharePoint sites, Outlook Web Access and IIS-based apps, inside your private network and provides secure access to users outside your network.

trans-unit.source: Using Application Proxy to publish applications for secure remote access
trans-unit.target: Using Application Proxy to publish applications for secure remote access

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure AD Application Proxy lets you publish applications, such as SharePoint sites, Outlook Web Access and IIS-based apps, inside your private network and provides secure access to users outside your network.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure AD Application Proxy lets you publish applications, such as SharePoint sites, Outlook Web Access and IIS-based apps, inside your private network and provides secure access to users outside your network.

trans-unit.source: Employees can log into your apps from home, on their own devices and authenticate through this cloud-based proxy.
trans-unit.target: Employees can log into your apps from home, on their own devices and authenticate through this cloud-based proxy.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Application Proxy is a feature that is available only if you upgraded to the Premium or Basic edition of Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Application Proxy is a feature that is available only if you upgraded to the Premium or Basic edition of Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Azure Active Directory editions](active-directory-editions).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Azure Active Directory editions](active-directory-editions).

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Premium and Basic editions are available for customers in China using the worldwide instance of Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Premium and Basic editions are available for customers in China using the worldwide instance of Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Premium and Basic editions are not currently supported in the Microsoft Azure service operated by 21Vianet in China.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Premium and Basic editions are not currently supported in the Microsoft Azure service operated by 21Vianet in China.

trans-unit.source: For more information, contact us at the [Azure Active Directory Forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/169401-azure-active-directory).
trans-unit.target: For more information, contact us at the [Azure Active Directory Forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/169401-azure-active-directory).

trans-unit.target: To get started using Application Proxy, follow these steps:
